3Ô∏è‚É£ JavaScript (script.js) - Interactive Features

js
// Function to Add Books to Library
function addBook() {
    let bookTitle = document.getElementById("bookTitle").value;
    let bookList = document.getElementById("bookList");
    if (bookTitle) {
        let listItem = document.createElement("li");
        listItem.textContent = bookTitle;
        bookList.appendChild(listItem);
        document.getElementById("bookTitle").value = "";
    }
}

// Function to Lend Books
function lendBook() {
    let lendBookTitle = document.getElementById("lendBookTitle").value;
    let borrowerName = document.getElementById("borrowerName").value;
    let lendList = document.getElementById("lendList");
    if (lendBookTitle && borrowerName) {
        let listItem = document.createElement("li");
        listItem.textContent = `"${lendBookTitle}" lent to ${borrowerName}`;
        lendList.appendChild(listItem);
        document.getElementById("lendBookTitle").value = "";
        document.getElementById("borrowerName").value = "";
    }
}

// Function to Add Events
function addEvent() {
    let eventName = document.getElementById("eventName").value;
    let eventList = document.getElementById("eventList");
    if (eventName) {
        let listItem = document.createElement("li");
        listItem.textContent = eventName;
        eventList.appendChild(listItem);
        document.getElementById("eventName").value = "";
    }
}

// Function to Add Blogs
function addBlog() {
    let blogContent = document.getElementById("blogContent").value;
    let blogList = document.getElementById("blogList");
    if (blogContent) {
        let listItem = document.createElement("li");
        listItem.textContent = blogContent;
        blogList.appendChild(listItem);
        document.getElementById("blogContent").value = "";
    }
}

        function addBook() {
            let bookTitle = document.getElementById("bookTitle").value;
            if (bookTitle) {
                document.getElementById("bookList").innerHTML += `<li>${bookTitle}</li>`;
                document.getElementById("bookTitle").value = "";
            }
        }

        function donateBook() {
            let donateBook = document.getElementById("donateBook").value;
            if (donateBook) {
                document.getElementById("donationList").innerHTML += `<li>${donateBook}</li>`;
                document.getElementById("donateBook").value = "";
            }
        }

        function lendBook() {
            let borrower = document.getElementById("borrowerName").value;
            let book = document.getElementById("borrowedBook").value;
            if (borrower && book) {
                document.getElementById("lendingList").innerHTML += `<li>${borrower} borrowed "${book}"</li>`;
                document.getElementById("borrowerName").value = "";
                document.getElementById("borrowedBook").value = "";
            }
        }

        function addEvent() {
            let event = document.getElementById("eventName").value;
            if (event) {
                document.getElementById("eventList").innerHTML += `<li>${event}</li>`;
                document.getElementById("eventName").value = "";
            }
        }

        function addBlog() {
            let blog = document.getElementById("blogContent").value;
            if (blog) {
                document.getElementById("blogList").innerHTML += `<li>${blog}</li>`;
                document.getElementById("blogContent").value = "";
            }
        }
    </script>

    <script>
        function addBook() {
            let bookTitle = document.getElementById("bookTitle").value;
            if (bookTitle) {
                let list = document.getElementById("bookList");
                list.innerHTML += `<li>${bookTitle}</li>`;
                document.getElementById("bookTitle").value = "";
            }
        }

        function donateBook() {
            let donateBook = document.getElementById("donateBook").value;
            if (donateBook) {
                document.getElementById("donationList").innerHTML += `<li>${donateBook}</li>`;
                document.getElementById("donateBook").value = "";
            }
        }

        function lendBook() {
            let borrower = document.getElementById("borrowerName").value;
            let book = document.getElementById("borrowedBook").value;
            if (borrower && book) {
                document.getElementById("lendingList").innerHTML += `<li>${borrower} borrowed "${book}"</li>`;
                document.getElementById("borrowerName").value = "";
                document.getElementById("borrowedBook").value = "";
            }
        }

        function addEvent() {
            let event = document.getElementById("eventName").value;
            if (event) {
                document.getElementById("eventList").innerHTML += `<li>${event}</li>`;
                document.getElementById("eventName").value = "";
            }
        }

        function addBlog() {
            let blog = document.getElementById("blogContent").value;
            if (blog) {
                document.getElementById("blogList").innerHTML += `<li>${blog}</li>`;
                document.getElementById("blogContent").value = "";
            }
        }
    </script>
